Plot: A young man tries to self-justify that he's a good person, only to spiral into primitive urges, leaving his mark all over Chicago.
Title: Meathead Goes Hog Wild
Writer: Kevin Cline, Zach Harris, Sean Pierce
Director: Kevin Cline, Zach Harris, Sean Pierce
Actors: Nicholia Q. Aguirre, Aquila Anderson, Vahan Artin, Sable Bedlam
